info.title: Auto White Balance

colour.autowhitebalance.name: colour.autowhitebalance
colour.autowhitebalance.description: This Resource describes an auto balance on/off feature. The Property "autoWhiteBalance" is a boolean. An AutoWhiteBalance value of 'true' means that the auto white balance feature is on. An AutoWhiteBalance value of 'false' means that the auto white balance feature is off.

autoWhiteBalance.name: auto white balance
autoWhiteBalance.description: The status of the Auto White balance feature.
